name: Agent Venom
ability: On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your deck to 3.

name: Ajax
ability: Ongoing: +1 Power for each card in play afflicted with negative Power.

name: Alioth
ability: On Reveal: Remove the text from all unrevealed enemy characters here.

name: Anti-Venom
ability: On Reveal: Set the Cost and Power of your deck's top card to 0.

name: Araña
ability: Activate: After you play your next card, give it +1 Power and move it to the right.

name: Ares
ability: On Reveal: Compare the Power of the top 3 cards of both decks. If your total is higher, +6 Power.

name: Arishem
ability: Game Start: Shuffle 12 new cards into your deck. On turn 3, get +1 Max Energy.

name: Aurora
ability: On Reveal: Give one of your other On Reveal cards at each location +2 Power. Repeat for Ongoing, Activate, and End of Turn.

name: Baron Zemo
ability: On Reveal: Recruit a card that costs the least from your opponent's deck to your side of this location.

name: Bastion
ability: On Reveal: Add copies of your other cards here to your hand. Set their Costs to 2 and Power to 3.

name: Black Swan
ability: Activate: Until the end of next turn, your 1-Cost cards cost 0.

name: Blink
ability: On Reveal: Swap the last card you played with a card that costs more from your deck.

name: Bruce Banner
ability: End of Turn: If you have unspent Energy, 33% chance to HULK OUT!

name: Bullseye
ability: Activate: Discard all cards that cost 1 or less from your hand. Afflict that many different enemy cards with -2 Power.

name: Caiera
ability: Ongoing: Your 1 and 6-Cost cards can't be destroyed.

name: Captain Carter
ability:
Ongoing: Add this card's Power to your back-row cards here.
(can't add to itself)

name: Cassandra Nova
ability: On Reveal: Steal 1 Power from each card in your opponent's deck.

name: Chamber
ability:
Activate: +2 Power for each
5-Cost or higher card you have
here and in hand.

name: Clea
ability: When this permanently gains Power, add Flames of the Faltine to your hand. (if in hand or in play)

name: Colonel America
ability: Ongoing: Your other cards here have +1 Power for each turn you've discarded a card.

name: Copycat
ability:
When you draw this, copy the text from the bottom card of your
opponent's deck.

name: Cosmic Ghost Rider
ability: On Reveal: Remove the text from front-row enemy cards here.

name: Diamondback
ability: Ongoing: Enemy cards here afflicted with negative Power have an additional -2 Power.

name: Doctor Doom 2099
ability: End of Turn: Add a DoomBot 2099 to a random location if you played (exactly) 1 card.

name: Dormammu
ability: Game Start: Begin a Summoning Ritual. (Add step 1 to hand.)

name: Dragon of the Moon
ability: On Reveal: Steal 1 Power from even-costed cards in ALL hands.

name: Elixir
ability: On Reveal: One of your cards destroyed last turn gets revived here.

name: Emperor Hulkling
ability: Game Start: Copy the text of a random 6-Cost card.

name: Esme Cuckoo
ability: On Reveal: Copy a card from your deck into your hand. Set its Cost to 3 and Power to 4.

name: Eson
ability: End of Turn: Put a created card from your hand here.

name: Ezekiel Sims
ability: After you play a card with higher Power here, give this +2 Power and move this to another location.

name: Fantomex
ability: Activate: If you've had cards discarded and destroyed, afflict front-row enemy cards at each location with -2 Power.

name: Fenris Wolf
ability: Activate: Resurrect your opponent's highest-Power discarded or destroyed card on your side of this location.

name: Firehair
ability: When one of your cards is destroyed, this uses that card’s On Reveal.

name: Frigga
ability: On Reveal: Add a copy of the last card you played to your hand. (if able)

name: Galacta
ability:
Each turn, the first card you play at another location reveals
with +2 Power.

name: Galactus
ability: On Reveal: If you're winning this location and this is your only card here, destroy all other locations.

name: Galactus First Steps
ability:
My Herald is the next character I see you play.

name: Gilgamesh
ability: On Reveal: +1 Power for each of your other cards in play with increased Power.

name: Goliath
ability: Ongoing: +1 Power for each other Ongoing card you have in play.

name: Gwenpool
ability: On Reveal: Pick a random character in your hand 3 times. Give +2 Power each time.

ability: On Reveal: Add 2 Arrows to your hand.

ability: Game Start: Unlock the potential of your cards with no abilities.

name: Hope Summers
ability: After you play a card here, you get +1 Energy next turn.

ability:
End of Turn: This moves if
